Description: Threshold cycle for mouse minus Eimeria in Ileum tissue. Only E. vermiformis is (at low pervalence in Ileum tissue) and we therfore don't obtain this data-type for all years.
threshold cycle for mouse minus Eimeria in Caecume tissue. E. ferrisi and E. falcifromis are detected here. We should have this (as coprehensively as possible) for every year

This was established in 2018 as an improvement over the '> -5 delta ct rule' for identification of Eimeria -positive qPCRs.
